author: Rita 803
review: It's only been a few months, but so far it's been great. Management has been helpful, as well as maintenance. The location is perfect with many trails leading out from the property. Rent is a bit high, but to me it's worth it, just the

author: Katie-Gray Landham
review: Our family has lived here for three years. We love the location, the neighbors, the pool, the woodsThis place is great! Management has always been helpful and responsive. Love love love!!

author: Jillian Jolie
review: Do not rent a unit from Fairhaven Park Apts.  The buildings have serious leaks that are left unfixed for years and no insulation in the walls.....this has led to horrible horrible mold-multiple and aggressive types.  My furniture and

author: Brandon Heald
review: Not as bad as people say. I personally love the location of these apartments. Very close to so many beautiful trails. Everywhere in Bham is super expensive and most places don't allow you to smoke on the balcony.

author: Dwight Mann
review: This used to be a nice place to live. Then around 2009 or so things started going downhill. Since then they try to jack up your rent to the max every year. On top of the rent increases they find other sneaky ways to squeeze more and more money out of you. The way they treat long time tenants is truly despicable.

author: Timothy Benson

author: Michael W
review: Love the look of the place its so cool
